name: Fireball
effect: A fiery explosion that deals damage

name: IceBlast
effect: Casts ice to slow enemies

name: LightningStrike
effect: Calls down lightning to deal massive damage

name: MeteorShower
effect: Summon meteor to rain down and cause area damage

name: FlameShield
effect: Creates a shield of flames that absorbs damage

name: ArcaneExplosion
effect: A burst of arcane energy damaging nearby foes

name: FrostNova
effect: Freezes enemies in place for a short duration

name: MirrorImage
effect: Creates an illusion of yourself and protects you

name: Polymorph
effect: Transforms yourself into a rhino for one turn

name: TimeWarp
effect: Speeds up allies' actions for a short duration

name: Teleport
effect: Teleports some of the damage to another location

name: IceBarrier
effect: Protects the caster with a barrier of ice

name: ConjureFood
effect: Creates food to restore health over time

name: ArcaneMissiles
effect: Fires a barrage of arcane missiles at a target

name: Blizzard
effect: Summons a storm of ice to damage and slow enemies

name: HealingLight
effect: Restores health to allies

name: DivineProtection
effect: Grants a protective barrier against attacks

name: HolySmite
effect: Deals radiant damage to enemies

name: AuraOfCourage
effect: Increases the morale of allies boosting their damage

name: GuardianAngel
effect: Summons a protective spirit to shield an ally

name: DivineIntervention
effect: Revives a fallen ally with a portion of their health

name: MassHeal
effect: Heals all allies in range

name: SacredShield
effect: Grants an ally a shield that absorbs damage

name: Purify
effect: Removes negative effects from allies

name: LightOfDawn
effect: Heals allies in a cone in front of the caster

name: TurnUndead
effect: Repels undead creatures

name: ShieldOfFaith
effect: Increases an ally's defense

name: SpiritLink
effect: Links the health of two allies together temporarily

name: Rejuvenation
effect: Restores health over time

name: Consecration
effect: Creates a damaging area of light

name: BlessingOfMight
effect: Increases an ally's strength

name: BattleRoar
effect: Increases attack power of allies in range

name: ShieldWall
effect: Raises a wall of shields to block incoming attacks

name: Cleave
effect: A powerful swing that hits multiple enemies

name: Charge
effect: Rushes forward to deal damage and knock back enemies

name: Fortify
effect: Temporarily increases defense

name: Whirlwind
effect: Spins around to damage all nearby enemies

name: Taunt
effect: Forces enemies to attack the warrior

name: Berserk
effect: Increases attack speed and damage for a short duration

name: HeroicLeap
effect: Leaps to a target dealing damage upon landing

name: ShieldBash
effect: Bashes an enemy with a shield stunning them

name: RallyingCry
effect: Increases the maximum health of allies temporarily

name: IronSkin
effect: Increases physical resistance for a short time

name: WarCry
effect: Boosts morale increasing the damage of nearby allies

name: Execute
effect: Finishes off a weakened enemy for high damage

name: DefensiveStance
effect: Reduces damage taken

name: GroundSlam
effect: Slams the ground dealing damage in a radius

name: ShadowStep
effect: Teleports behind an enemy to deal a surprise attack

name: SmokeBomb
effect: Creates a cloud of smoke to obscure vision

name: PoisonBlade
effect: Adds poison damage to attacks for a short duration

name: Invisibility
effect: Grants invisibility for stealthy maneuvers

name: Evasion
effect: Increases dodge chance temporarily

name: Backstab
effect: Deals extra damage when attacking from stealth

name: DisarmTrap
effect: Disarms traps in the area

name: GrapplingHook
effect: Allows quick movement to elevated areas

name: Vanish
effect: Makes the rogue temporarily invisible and untargetable

name: FanOfKnives
effect: Throws knives at all enemies in range

name: Silence
effect: Prevents an enemy from casting spells for a duration

name: ShadowDance
effect: Grants extra abilities while in stealth

name: CloakOfShadows
effect: Reduces damage from magic attacks temporarily

name: CharmedLife
effect: Temporarily increases luck for critical hits

name: SliceAndDice
effect: Increases attack speed for a short duration

name: QuickEscape
effect: Increases movement speed to escape danger
